name: Mincoin
description: MinCoin (Min is short for Minimalist) is a fork of Litecoin and has a supply of 10 millions coins. It was released on April 3, 2013 with zero premine. "To empower people with the ability to govern their finances by enabling them with a superior method of wealth storage, wealth transfer & a mobile payment solution currency not available within today's banking system & the outdated infrastructure it supports." - Mission Statement, MinCoin Dev Team
